Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SearchProcessor::SearchProcessor (  MapSafeVector *  loadedMaps  ) 
 

Creates a new SearchProcessor.

Parameters:
loadedMaps A SafeVector that is used as communication between the Processor and the Reader. Contains ID of all maps that are loaded by this SearchProcessor.

Deletes the SearchProcessor.

Virtual function to be called when a map should be deleted.

Parameters:
mapID The map to be deleted.
Returns:
StringTable::OK if ok.

Implements MapHandlingProcessor.

virtual int SearchProcessor::getCurrentStatus (   )  [virtual]
 

Implements the virtual method in the base class, Processor.

This is currently not used (and not really implemented).

Implements Processor.

Gets the SearchUnit that holds a specific mapID.

mapID The mapID.
Returns:
A pointer to the SearchUnit or NULL if not found.

void SearchProcessor::handleAlarm (  int  iMsg  )  [static]
 

Alarm handling function.

Will quit with panic.

virtual Packet* SearchProcessor::handleRequestPacket (  const RequestPacket &  p,
char *  packetInfo
)  [protected, virtual]
 

Processes the incoming packets.

The RequestPacket is given as parameter and the ReplyPacket is returned. If the reply is created with new, the request packet must be deleted!

Parameters:
p The request packet that should be processed.
packetInfo A string to fill with info about the packet. Will be printed by JobThread. WARNING GMSMap sends in NULL here, so you have to check.
Returns:
A (reply)Packet that is the reply to the given request.

Implements Processor.

SearchExpandItemReplyPacket* SearchProcessor::handleSearchExpandItem (  const SearchExpandItemRequestPacket *  req  )  [private]
 

Handles the SearchExpandItemRequestPacket.

Parameters:
req The request.
Returns:
The reply.

ReplyPacket* SearchProcessor::handleSearchRequestPacket (  const SearchRequestPacket *  req,
char *  packetInfo
)  [private]
 

Handles the new SearchRequestPackets.

Parameters:
req The SearchRequestPacket.
packetInfo String to put JobThread output in.
Returns:
ReplyPacket since OverviewSearches return OverviewSearchReplyPacket.

virtual StringTable::stringCode SearchProcessor::loadMap (  uint32  mapID,
uint32 &  mapSize
)  [virtual]
 

Virtual function for loading a map.

Should be called by handleRequest when that function gets a loadMapRequest and isn't virtual anymore.

Parameters:
mapID The map to load.
mapSize Outparameter describing the size of the map.
Returns:
StringTable::OK if ok.

Implements MapHandlingProcessor.

void SearchProcessor::setAlarm (  uint32  seconds  )  [private]
 

Sets the alarm timer.

If set to 0, the alarm is off. Once the alarm is triggered, handleAlarm will kill the program, assuming it has hanged.

Parameters:
seconds The time in seconds to the alarm.
